name: War on Wheels
description:
Apocalypse, Wildland, War Rigs, Madness, and Death. The absolute breathtaking battle racing game is coming!

--Background--
In a devastated, apocalyptic world, survival is the only purpose, and your War Rig is the only thing you can rely on! Guns and Wheels shall bring hope and order to this world! Drive your War Rigs, survive from the enemies’ sieges. Use your weapons and wheels to destroy them all!

--Highlights--
- Real-time Collision, release your passion.
Bringing you the most thrilling battles with the engine based on real-time physics!
- American comics style, extraordinary graphics.
Enter the wasteland inspired by an American comics style, enjoy a completely different visual feast!
- Different gaming experiences with various types of War Rigs to choose from.
14 different kinds of War Rigs, including SUVs with minigun, heavily-armored vehicles, muscle cars with missile launchers, and so much more. Customize you War Rigs to eliminate your enemies any way you want!
- Can you handle the War Rigs? Come and challenge yourself!
Reach the destination or eliminate enemies within a limited time. You’ll not only need powerful weapons but also your driving skills!
